item.title: Shopee Malaysia is showing support for breast cancer awareness by going pink
item.description: Shopee, a popular online marketplace in Malaysia, is partnering with the Pink Ribbon Deeds (PRIDE) Foundation for a “Goes Pink” campaign throughout October to raise awareness about breast cancer. The campaign involves both online and offline initiatives. Shopee’s “Goes Pink” collection features pink and white products across various categories like mobile accessories, beauty products, and home goods, encouraging users to purchase and show their support. With over 2 million app installs in Malaysia, Shopee aims to leverage its platform to spread awareness nationwide.

item.title: Inglot will be opening a new store in Singapore next month
item.description: Inglot, the cosmetics company, will open its doors in Singapore on October 1st. Source: Inglot Singapore Facebook page. The new store, located at Wisma Atria #B1-14, will host a grand opening on October 1st, according to Inglot Singapore’s Facebook page. On October 1st and 2nd, from 4-5 pm, Inglot makeup artist Ela Kocot will offer complimentary makeup demonstrations. Those interested in attending can register through the details provided on Inglot Singapore’s Facebook page.
